Çok güzel bir oyun 

+Çok gerçekçi
+Silahı kullanmak zor ve güzel
+Haritaları Zula çalmış
+Haritalar güzel (Dust 2 den vazgeçemeyiz)
+Oyun sayesinde yeni profil resmi yaptım.
+Zengin olan fakir olandan üstün değil.
-----------------------------------------

Only cheating pigs playing this game trusted mode is useless aswell as prime matchmaking this game is unplayable.If you want to lose lifetime playing this stupid game do it but dont expect getting fair matches with no cheaters literally every game you play there is atleast one with wh and aimbot.The higher you get in ranks the more they try to hide their cheats.LITERALLY impossible to find a solo q mm game without cheaters.
